description: Co-founder of Flufy, a SaaS platform designed for businesses and entrepreneurs. Key contributions included integrating Mercado Pago for subscription management, implementing WebSockets to facilitate real-time communication between businesses and customers regarding order status, and utilizing Google Places and Maps APIs for business data and location services. Developed the core CRUD systems for products, categories, and additional modules features, along with the custom theme colors system and the majority of UI components. Also responsible for the deployment and launch of the application.

Led the frontend team for Manganeta, an online manga reader. Oversaw frontend development and collaborated closely with the backend team, implementing data fetching and adaptation from MangadexAPI, building the manga reader interface, and developing the search and routing logic. Also responsible for the deployment and launch of the application.
Entrusted with the development of the frontend for a personal budget management application, implementing key features such as tables, forms, and charts under the mentorship of a senior developer.
